articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Floods in South Africa's Durban area kill more than 340 - 9News
articles.description: Heavy rains and flooding have killed at least 341 people in South Africa's eastern KwaZulu-Natal province, including the city of Durban, and more rainstorms are forecast in the coming days.
